channel.title: 清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太
channel.description: 清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太

item.title: 清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太[100-150]
item.description:
清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太 https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/MIxhP86H7369xRNJjQhm1g
张月姣院长写给WTO上诉机构成员的英文信
原创： 张月姣清华大学国际争端解决研究院 前天
A Sad Day!
Dear AB fellow colleagues and ABS staff friends,
I am writing to you since midnight from Beijing. Today is the last working day of the AB which is the unique founctioning well international appeal mechanism of 24 years existence in the world. We are all proud of its achievements. How beautiful name of the AB the Crown Jewel of the WTO! I couldn't sleep and remember the 40 cases we worked very hard together. Days and nights at the AB plus many weekendsdevoted to the careful case handling in the WTO offices even we sacrificed our vacations and families lives, because we believe our mission is glorious and it is respective by the world trade community! We were working for the rule based multilateral trading system and for the rule of law. Now I feel so bad and with tears for the collapse of the AB where I had spent more than eight years of professional lifetime with my fellow ABM colleagues and ABS staffs who are dedicated and committed to the AB ensuring prompt and positive solution of disputes among WTO members. This year I returned back to the WTO twice. I saw ABMs colleagues and ABS staff were working very hard even under pressure and uncertainty. I enjoyed meeting so many old friends and colleagues. We shared the same wishes to save the AB by all of our modest efforts. I appreciated very much the meetings with the DG, DSB Chair, DDGs, Directors, current and former AB members and WTO staffs. Their recognition of the AB's role and its achievements demonstrate their support to the appeal system of the WTO DS. Unfortunately we couldn't save the AB from stopping founctioning. It is a member driven institution! But we are encouraged by the big majority of the WTO members calling for the start of ABMS selection process and protect the AB! Meanwhile many reform proposals of the AB including ours are submitted to the DSB for consideration. I believe that WTO DS needs an appeal mechanism like the international investment dispute settlement organizations which are considering to set up a similar appeal system. Dispute settlement is am important element of the rule of law and it is a public goods. Panel reports by ad hoc arbitration or panelists need a correction system and an authoritative body to keep the consistency of treaty interpretation.
I cherish very much the ABMs and ABS' work and friendship. Independence and impartiality become a quality of our professional life. No matter what difficulties we may encounter, we should always follow our believes in the rule of law. The AB will come back! The WTO will never die!
Keep in touch.
I love you all!
Best Regards
Yuejiao
at one clock of 10 December 2019
文冤阁大学士：
清华大学以实际行动告诉我们，为什么四六级不能取消。此文是一位律师朋友转给我看的，他的评语：sentimental, disorganised, unstructured, an outpouring of mumbo-jumbo, betraying the overall undereducatedness of the whole n—. 我的评语没这么文绉绉，就俩字：丢人。 ​​​
item.content:encoded:
pigofsunny:
洗个屁。在其位，谋其政。你知道这是公文，还写成这样？

mercceec:
相较于英文水平，法律能力更烂才成问题。外交部，商务部混进一堆只懂外语的有个屁用。
你们就没见过外国语学校的，英语四级都过不了的吗？少见多怪毫不奇怪
何况张本人水平如何，也是和她那一代人对比，还真轮不到你指指点点
—— 来自 vivo NEX S, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.2.0.1

payboy:
The AB will come back! The WTO will never die!激情澎湃

item.title: 清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太[50-100]
item.description:
清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太 https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/MIxhP86H7369xRNJjQhm1g
张月姣院长写给WTO上诉机构成员的英文信
原创： 张月姣清华大学国际争端解决研究院 前天
A Sad Day!
Dear AB fellow colleagues and ABS staff friends,
I am writing to you since midnight from Beijing. Today is the last working day of the AB which is the unique founctioning well international appeal mechanism of 24 years existence in the world. We are all proud of its achievements. How beautiful name of the AB the Crown Jewel of the WTO! I couldn't sleep and remember the 40 cases we worked very hard together. Days and nights at the AB plus many weekendsdevoted to the careful case handling in the WTO offices even we sacrificed our vacations and families lives, because we believe our mission is glorious and it is respective by the world trade community! We were working for the rule based multilateral trading system and for the rule of law. Now I feel so bad and with tears for the collapse of the AB where I had spent more than eight years of professional lifetime with my fellow ABM colleagues and ABS staffs who are dedicated and committed to the AB ensuring prompt and positive solution of disputes among WTO members. This year I returned back to the WTO twice. I saw ABMs colleagues and ABS staff were working very hard even under pressure and uncertainty. I enjoyed meeting so many old friends and colleagues. We shared the same wishes to save the AB by all of our modest efforts. I appreciated very much the meetings with the DG, DSB Chair, DDGs, Directors, current and former AB members and WTO staffs. Their recognition of the AB's role and its achievements demonstrate their support to the appeal system of the WTO DS. Unfortunately we couldn't save the AB from stopping founctioning. It is a member driven institution! But we are encouraged by the big majority of the WTO members calling for the start of ABMS selection process and protect the AB! Meanwhile many reform proposals of the AB including ours are submitted to the DSB for consideration. I believe that WTO DS needs an appeal mechanism like the international investment dispute settlement organizations which are considering to set up a similar appeal system. Dispute settlement is am important element of the rule of law and it is a public goods. Panel reports by ad hoc arbitration or panelists need a correction system and an authoritative body to keep the consistency of treaty interpretation.
I cherish very much the ABMs and ABS' work and friendship. Independence and impartiality become a quality of our professional life. No matter what difficulties we may encounter, we should always follow our believes in the rule of law. The AB will come back! The WTO will never die!
Keep in touch.
I love you all!
Best Regards
Yuejiao
at one clock of 10 December 2019
文冤阁大学士：
清华大学以实际行动告诉我们，为什么四六级不能取消。此文是一位律师朋友转给我看的，他的评语：sentimental, disorganised, unstructured, an outpouring of mumbo-jumbo, betraying the overall undereducatedness of the whole n—. 我的评语没这么文绉绉，就俩字：丢人。 ​​​
item.content:encoded:
囧Smith:
战神bati 发表于 2019-12-12 14:00
张月姣，女，汉族，944年10月25日出生，清华大学法学院兼职教授。1968年获法国汉纳大学学士学位。1981至198 ...
单纯看履历不应该英语是这样子啊

佛兰克:
就这，这还不如川普呢

希斯塔姆:
非诚勿扰里葛优卖给范伟的分歧终端机是不是就是这个国际争端解决研究院的研究成果？

孤舟垂钓:
囧Smith 发表于 2019-12-12 14:05
单纯看履历不应该英语是这样子啊
美语环境才2年，写的不太好很正常，法国人的散装英语是欧洲最烂的，在法国基本没人说英语，而且年龄又那么大了，如果是自己写的，我觉得ok

leystage:
mrock 发表于 2019-12-12 13:19
Appellate Body
哦哦好的，学习了

烂柯人:
读起是有一点low，但也没必要这样挂起来婊嘛

朔方原的星:
又不是教英语的，英语烂点就烂点呗

liuliu66:
有一说一就这根本比不上川普的

zhenniuren:
日本人那英语水平不照样欧美发布会上磕磕巴巴半日不洋的说
雷军英语水平不照样how areyou, are you ok的说
又不是所有人都是英语翻译 表达对意思 没有严重语法文法错误没有歧义我觉得就可以了

dclara1:
"中国大学校长用英文写信，见不见啊"

kumquat_cc:
批评别人的英语，那个年代的老人有好多连字都认不全的。

ddrevolution:
确实不少很低级的失误。

doomiao:
讲道理4 级作文水平也比这好吧，自己英语不行好赖过一下秘书整理一下吧

点点杠:
天网 发表于 2019-12-12 12:10
我日常生活是够用了。还有语音转文本，准确率超高。挂一个dualSub插件，可以把自动生成的英语+中文 ...
好读书不求甚解，用用当然行，你用这个去做4，6级卷子对不对就难说了

doomiao:
这根本不是行文的问题，写东西不行、语言不通这都是小问题，但这东西毕竟不是发给下属玩的，是对外的，你得对自己的脸面和对方有起码的尊重，明知道自己英语不行就找个人调一下语法表意再发，他一个院长还是做对外的院长，怎样都能找到这样一个人，这就态度问题，如果真发出去了弄不好是喝了两杯酒诗兴大发瞎敲一通捅出去的

利物浦:
刚才稍微去搜了下“法国汉纳大学”。。

luice:
同意楼上，写得怎样都应该找专人修订，现在这样是罔顾中国的国际形象，缺乏基本工作步骤规范的体现。清北近来乱子出的不少，不愧是一流学生，二流教授，不入流管理
-- 来自 能搜索的 Stage1官方 Android客户端

exia00raiser:
有我第一篇论文内味了

caikena:
为什么搜不到这个汉纳大学
-- 来自 能搜索的 Stage1官方 Android客户端

骈儿:
看岁数，大于60岁甚至大于50岁这个水平没什么稀奇的
平时也基本用不上，文章都是学生写的，学好能干嘛呢

尼特geek:
caikena 发表于 2019-12-12 16:22
为什么搜不到这个汉纳大学
-- 来自 能搜索的 Stage1官方 Android客户端
就只有这位院长的履历上可以看到汉纳大学，其他一概搜不到。

dclara1:
因为隔壁张大爷英文也不会说，所以专业是涉外事务相关的清华院长、wto中方谈判代表只有这种水平也是应该理解的
上面某些潭友发言也太厉害了

忠义无双汪精卫:
作为正式发文的话的确太没牌面了，至少请人审核下也好啊……

albertfu:
尼特geek 发表于 2019-12-12 16:27
就只有这位院长的履历上可以看到汉纳大学，其他一概搜不到。
https://www.tsinghua.edu.cn/publish/lawen/3562/2011/20110919152802898311856/20110919152802898311856_.html
翻译的锅，Rennes今天的翻译是雷恩

albertfu:
https://www.wto.org/english/news_e/news16_e/dsb_26oct16_e.pdf
张月娇女士在WTO的告别演说

姜子牙:
albertfu 发表于 2019-12-12 17:19
https://www.wto.org/english/news_e/news16_e/dsb_26oct16_e.pdf
张月娇女士在WTO的告别演说
可能是WTO里一堆老外打下手，随时改稿子。
到了清华， 学生以为她是权威， 一字不改的发出来了。 让我们看到了真实的一面

wzyboy:
本帖最后由 wzyboy 于 2019-12-12 21:09 编辑
编辑

aranyakay:
两个路人 发表于 2019-12-12 11:40
https://www.tsinghua.edu.cn/publish/lawen/8094/index.html 我看这院长年纪挺大的，估摸有50+？按他们的 ...
马的口语很不错好么。。。。
前两天看到他和孙的采访，他一开口英语比孙高几个档次

姜子牙:
哈里.谢顿 发表于 2019-12-12 12:19
http://english.cctv.com/2016/11/01/VIDEyI61HQ0Jc0UhmhJ7Iuxv161101.shtml
-- 来自 能手机投票的 Stag ...
看得出来，词汇局限于少量的口语单词，和少数专业术语。
这个口语水平写出清华的这篇文章 不算奇怪。

姜子牙:
本帖最后由 姜子牙 于 2019-12-12 21:34 编辑
aranyakay 发表于 2019-12-12 21:19
马的口语很不错好么。。。。
前两天看到他和孙的采访，他一开口英语比孙高几个档次
...
马的口语水平不高啊
只是口音没有严重的华人口音。 但是词汇量和用语严重不足。 从采访来看，很多句子就是复读机

spoony:
背后捅刀擎天柱 发表于 2019-12-12 11:39
上学的时候老师跟我们说法语比英语准确，国际条纹都是用法语写的！所以张院长一定是学法语的！英语跟川普一 ...
我就看了第一句 这肯定是川普的英语水平被黑的最惨的一次 人家好歹是美国人好吗 3岁的时候也不会犯这种错误
不过亲历亲为的精神倒是跟川皇很像

spoony:
GoInDown 发表于 2019-12-12 11:18
想多了，鲁迅先生就说过：4 6级救不了这封信
我就看了第一句 四六级绝对可以参与抢救

aranyakay:
姜子牙 发表于 2019-12-12 21:32
马的口语水平不高啊
只是口音没有严重的华人口音。 但是词汇量和用语严重不足。 从采访来看，很多句子就 ...
口音没有华人口音已经很难了，要求也不高，英语环境呆5年+吧。
我看到马答记者的当场问话，他已经是英语思维了，这种挺难得的，对他这种没有正儿八经留学过的人来说。实际上和英语国家的人对话，并不是看你的词汇量，而是看你能不能用英语思考问题。比如apple，你直接能反应成水果苹果这个东西，而不是先过中文苹果再反应过来是苹果。采访的时候孙确实用词比马考究，但马的发言更符合正常的英语国家人的发言习惯。孙反而像是红宝书背多了。

mrock:
albertfu 发表于 2019-12-12 17:17
https://www.tsinghua.edu.cn/publish/lawen/3562/2011/20110919152802898311856/2011091915280289831185 ...
Rennes在法语的确读作汉纳，离雷恩倒是差得远

albertfu:
mrock 发表于 2019-12-12 21:53
Rennes在法语的确读作汉纳，离雷恩倒是差得远
我当然知道Rennes怎么发音（我就是被这贴疯狂吐槽的人群之一），但是汉钠这个翻译也太老了以至于哪里都查不到

六等星:
这贴最有意思的就是评论了。

魔发精灵2:
本帖最后由 魔发精灵2 于 2019-12-13 04:06 编辑
zhenniuren 发表于 2019-12-12 15:23
日本人那英语水平不照样欧美发布会上磕磕巴巴半日不洋的说
雷军英语水平不照样how areyou, are you ok的 ...
他们又不是语言类涉外事务谈判代表相关专业人士 洗的不行啊

curiousnoob:
孤舟垂钓 发表于 2019-12-12 14:21:59
美语环境才2年，写的不太好很正常，法国人的散装英语是欧洲最烂的，在法国基本没人说英语，而且年龄又那 ...Gulc+Columbia锻炼两年还不够？怎么会写成这样的，无法理解
-- 来自 有消息提醒的 Stage1官方 iOS客户端

魔发精灵2:
kumquat_cc 发表于 2019-12-12 15:39
批评别人的英语，那个年代的老人有好多连字都认不全的。
连字都认不全是如何做到：1968年获法国汉纳大学学士学位。1981至1982年赴美国乔治顿法学院、哥伦比亚大学法学院学习，获法学硕士学位。1985年取得中国律师资格。 通晓语言：中文，英语，法语，有长期国际贸易、金融和投资法律的经验，曾在中国技术经济情报所工作。世界银行解决投资争端国际中心仲裁员，曾任外经贸部条法司司长，世界贸易组织争端解决机制上诉机构主席。

nicebody:
两个路人 发表于 2019-12-12 11:40
https://www.tsinghua.edu.cn/publish/lawen/8094/index.html 我看这院长年纪挺大的，估摸有50+？按他们的 ...
问题不是她游过么

姜子牙:
aranyakay 发表于 2019-12-12 21:47
口音没有华人口音已经很难了，要求也不高，英语环境呆5年+吧。
我看到马答记者的当场问话，他已经是英语 ...
别洗地了
还神TM英文思维。
马这水平 就是唐人街做小买卖的水平， 因为在外工作，日常用语有人和她说， 可以得到练习。   稍微专业一点的，看得出来马 自身从来不练， 别人也不会特意来教，或者让她背熟几句口号式句子就可以

姜子牙:
魔发精灵2 发表于 2019-12-13 04:17
连字都认不全是如何做到：1968年获法国汉纳大学学士学位。1981至1982年赴美国乔治顿法学院、哥伦比亚大学 ...
很多有“国家”背景的留学生，大学里不会太严格。 走个过场

aranyakay:
姜子牙 发表于 2019-12-13 06:56
别洗地了
还神TM英文思维。
你觉得马水平不高，是用什么人做参照物？我对比的是和他同样年龄，从未长期国外居住的中年成功人士，你呢？难道是混迹美国十年的华人街打工仔？
王思聪混迹英国也差不多十多年了，他的英语发音和就和马云也不相上下吧

xzhao:
fredette 发表于 2019-12-12 11:43
对不起，我带清还就真的不考46级，只有水平一/二考试
46级是optional的，我都考了。

cqduoluo:
一个中国人英语不好咋了，有什么丢人的，有这种想法的自己才是low B。

姜子牙:
这事情说严重了 就是这老太英文不行 导致常年在国际谈判中劣势并导致失利，甚至可能常年出卖国家利益，所以被老外捧到了关键位置

dclara1:
cqduoluo 发表于 2019-12-13 08:28
一个中国人英语不好咋了，有什么丢人的，有这种想法的自己才是low B。
"中国人学英语，见不见呐"
有内味了

姜子牙:
aranyakay 发表于 2019-12-13 08:04
你觉得马水平不高，是用什么人做参照物？我对比的是和他同样年龄，从未长期国外居住的中年成功人士，你呢 ...
看来你很不屑留美十年华人打工仔嘛
敢问哪里高就啊？

zhenniuren:
魔发精灵2 发表于 2019-12-13 04:04
他们又不是语言类涉外事务谈判代表相关专业人士 洗的不行啊

sangtianzhou:
我一个爷爷辈亲戚，南大副教授，法语，会好几种语言，有段时间住我家，看cctv4，英语新闻，看一半说听不懂让我转台

item.title: 清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太[0-50]
item.description:
清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太 https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/MIxhP86H7369xRNJjQhm1g
张月姣院长写给WTO上诉机构成员的英文信
原创： 张月姣清华大学国际争端解决研究院 前天
A Sad Day!
Dear AB fellow colleagues and ABS staff friends,
I am writing to you since midnight from Beijing. Today is the last working day of the AB which is the unique founctioning well international appeal mechanism of 24 years existence in the world. We are all proud of its achievements. How beautiful name of the AB the Crown Jewel of the WTO! I couldn't sleep and remember the 40 cases we worked very hard together. Days and nights at the AB plus many weekendsdevoted to the careful case handling in the WTO offices even we sacrificed our vacations and families lives, because we believe our mission is glorious and it is respective by the world trade community! We were working for the rule based multilateral trading system and for the rule of law. Now I feel so bad and with tears for the collapse of the AB where I had spent more than eight years of professional lifetime with my fellow ABM colleagues and ABS staffs who are dedicated and committed to the AB ensuring prompt and positive solution of disputes among WTO members. This year I returned back to the WTO twice. I saw ABMs colleagues and ABS staff were working very hard even under pressure and uncertainty. I enjoyed meeting so many old friends and colleagues. We shared the same wishes to save the AB by all of our modest efforts. I appreciated very much the meetings with the DG, DSB Chair, DDGs, Directors, current and former AB members and WTO staffs. Their recognition of the AB's role and its achievements demonstrate their support to the appeal system of the WTO DS. Unfortunately we couldn't save the AB from stopping founctioning. It is a member driven institution! But we are encouraged by the big majority of the WTO members calling for the start of ABMS selection process and protect the AB! Meanwhile many reform proposals of the AB including ours are submitted to the DSB for consideration. I believe that WTO DS needs an appeal mechanism like the international investment dispute settlement organizations which are considering to set up a similar appeal system. Dispute settlement is am important element of the rule of law and it is a public goods. Panel reports by ad hoc arbitration or panelists need a correction system and an authoritative body to keep the consistency of treaty interpretation.
I cherish very much the ABMs and ABS' work and friendship. Independence and impartiality become a quality of our professional life. No matter what difficulties we may encounter, we should always follow our believes in the rule of law. The AB will come back! The WTO will never die!
Keep in touch.
I love you all!
Best Regards
Yuejiao
at one clock of 10 December 2019
文冤阁大学士：
清华大学以实际行动告诉我们，为什么四六级不能取消。此文是一位律师朋友转给我看的，他的评语：sentimental, disorganised, unstructured, an outpouring of mumbo-jumbo, betraying the overall undereducatedness of the whole n—. 我的评语没这么文绉绉，就俩字：丢人。 ​​​
item.content:encoded:
哈里.谢顿:
清华大学的某院长的这篇英文是不是太
https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/MIxhP86H7369xRNJjQhm1g
张月姣院长写给WTO上诉机构成员的英文信
原创： 张月姣清华大学国际争端解决研究院 前天
A Sad Day!
Dear AB fellow colleagues and ABS staff friends,
I am writing to you since midnight from Beijing. Today is the last working day of the AB which is the unique founctioning well international appeal mechanism of 24 years existence in the world. We are all proud of its achievements. How beautiful name of the AB the Crown Jewel of the WTO! I couldn't sleep and remember the 40 cases we worked very hard together. Days and nights at the AB plus many weekendsdevoted to the careful case handling in the WTO offices even we sacrificed our vacations and families lives, because we believe our mission is glorious and it is respective by the world trade community! We were working for the rule based multilateral trading system and for the rule of law. Now I feel so bad and with tears for the collapse of the AB where I had spent more than eight years of professional lifetime with my fellow ABM colleagues and ABS staffs who are dedicated and committed to the AB ensuring prompt and positive solution of disputes among WTO members. This year I returned back to the WTO twice. I saw ABMs colleagues and ABS staff were working very hard even under pressure and uncertainty. I enjoyed meeting so many old friends and colleagues. We shared the same wishes to save the AB by all of our modest efforts. I appreciated very much the meetings with the DG, DSB Chair, DDGs, Directors, current and former AB members and WTO staffs. Their recognition of the AB's role and its achievements demonstrate their support to the appeal system of the WTO DS. Unfortunately we couldn't save the AB from stopping founctioning. It is a member driven institution! But we are encouraged by the big majority of the WTO members calling for the start of ABMS selection process and protect the AB! Meanwhile many reform proposals of the AB including ours are submitted to the DSB for consideration. I believe that WTO DS needs an appeal mechanism like the international investment dispute settlement organizations which are considering to set up a similar appeal system. Dispute settlement is am important element of the rule of law and it is a public goods. Panel reports by ad hoc arbitration or panelists need a correction system and an authoritative body to keep the consistency of treaty interpretation.
I cherish very much the ABMs and ABS' work and friendship. Independence and impartiality become a quality of our professional life. No matter what difficulties we may encounter, we should always follow our believes in the rule of law. The AB will come back! The WTO will never die!
Keep in touch.
I love you all!
Best Regards
Yuejiao
at one clock of 10 December 2019
文冤阁大学士：
清华大学以实际行动告诉我们，为什么四六级不能取消。此文是一位律师朋友转给我看的，他的评语：sentimental, disorganised, unstructured, an outpouring of mumbo-jumbo, betraying the overall undereducatedness of the whole n—. 我的评语没这么文绉绉，就俩字：丢人。 ​​​

Good news!
Too bad!
MTGA!

没啥问题

还是简单句为主。。。可能就这种锤子英语水平吧

费老师:
I am writing to you since midnight from Beijing.

费老师:
其实清华就是这个水平

索尔之怒:
首先是这个“清华大学国际争端解决研究院”
根据清华官网的新闻报道，这个机构是真的，这位院长也是真的
其次是这个微信公众号
如果微信的认证信得过，那么好像也是真的……？
专门注册个号，赶紧发一篇这个……？
太假，不敢信，又不敢不信

天网:
本帖最后由 天网 于 2019-12-12 11:37 编辑
编辑编辑，我本来打了一大段字，大意是不如谷歌翻译就就不如呗，，正因为有机器翻译+越来越强大了，英文越来越工具化，不用投入精力学就能用机器搞定才是好事，本专业学术水平够了要这么好的英文干什么
然后中途出去搜了一下，张女士居然是搞对外、国际法、起草各种文书这类工作的，当我没说好了

我次奥 这写的啥玩意

尼特geek:
我上我也行

背后捅刀擎天柱:
上学的时候老师跟我们说法语比英语准确，国际条纹都是用法语写的！所以张院长一定是学法语的！英语跟川普一个水平是很正常的！

天知道:
索尔之怒 发表于 2019-12-12 11:30
首先是这个“清华大学国际争端解决研究院”
根据清华官网的新闻报道，这个机构是真的，这位院长也是真的
而且最奇葩的是张是1968年就获得法国学士学位，1976年长年在欧洲参与购买技术的谈判，1998年后在多个国际机构担任高官和法官。

我日常生活是够用了。还有语音转文本，准确率超高。挂一个dualSub插件，可以把自动生成的英语+中文机翻双行显示，油管各种生活技巧、软件课程、科普、教程课都可以随便看，中文搞定大意，觉得奇怪的地方和细节再对照一下英文，反正我自我觉得85%-90%+的意思理解到了，超爽。放几年前不敢想，科技改变生活内味就感觉出来了

战神bati:
本帖最后由 战神bati 于 2019-12-12 14:19 编辑
张月姣，女，汉族，1944年10月25日出生，清华大学法学院兼职教授。1968年获法国汉纳大学学士学位。1981至1982年赴美国乔治顿法学院、哥伦比亚大学法学院学习，获法学硕士学位。1985年取得中国律师资格。 张月姣律师通晓语言：中文，英语，法语，有长期国际贸易、金融和投资法律的经验，曾在中国技术经济情报所工作。世界银行解决投资争端国际中心仲裁员，曾任外经贸部条法司司长，世界贸易组织争端解决机制上诉机构主席。
